RelatedSentence: - Colombian President Juan Manuel Santos on Monday denounced his main challenger in the May 25 election for running a criminal campaign , as evidenced by a video showing candidate Oscar Ivan Zuluaga meeting with a man recently arrested for cyber - espionage targeting the government .
